artifact.content: Use Case Number: UC1 Name: MakeCalls Authors: M1, M2, M3, M4 Event: Caller initiates phone call with Callee. Actors: Caller (initiator), Callee Overview: This use case captures the process of establishing a phone call.

Use Case Number: UC3 Name: ConductTest Authors: M1, M2, M3, M4 Event: Administrator requests tests to be conducted on a specific phone. The phone number is passed in as input. Actors: Administrator (initiator) Overview: This use case captures the process of conducting tests on a phone subsystem.

Use Case Number: UC4 Name: CheckStatus Authors: M1, M2, M3, M4 Event: Administrator requests system status. Actors: Administrator (initiator) Overview: This use case captures the process of checking system status.

Use Case Number: UC5 Name: Login Authors: M1, M2, M3, M4 Event: Administrator requests to log in to the System. Actors: Administrator (initiator) Overview: This use case captures the login process to the System.

Use Case Number: UC6 Name: Logout Authors: M1, M2, M3, M4 Event: Administrator requests to log out of the System. Actors: Administrator (initiator) Overview: This use case captures the logout process of the System.

Use Case Number: UC7 Name: RunEndOfMonthProcess Authors: M1, M2, M3, M4 Event: Administrator generates account bills at the end of the billing month. Actors: Administrator (initiator) Overview: This use case captures the process of performing end-of-month duties.

Use Case Number: UC8 Name: CreateUser Authors: M1, M2, M3, M4 Event: Administrator creates a new user in the system. Actors: Administrator (initiator) Overview: This use case captures the process of creating a new user in the system.

Use Case Number: UC9 Name: CreateBillingPlan Authors: M1, M2, M3, M4 Event: Administrator requests to create a new billing plan. Actors: Administrator (initiator) Overview: This use case captures the process of creating a new billing plan.

Use Case Number: UC10 Name: CancelAccount Authors: M1, M2, M3, M4 Event: Administrators requests to cancel an account. The phone number is passed as input. Actors: Administrator (initiator) Overview: This use case captures the process of cancelling an existing account in the system.

Use Case Number: UC11 Name: EnterPayment Authors: M1, M2, M3, M4 Event: Administrator selects option to enter payment. The phone number is passed as input. Actors: Administrator (initiator) Overview: This use case captures the process of inputting payment information.

Use Case Number: UC12 Name: SuspendAccount Authors: M1, M2, M3, M4 Event: Administrator selects option to suspend a user�s account. The phone number is passed as input. Actors: Administrator (initiator) Overview: This use case captures the process of suspending an existing account in the system.

Use Case Number: UC13 Name: ModifyUser Authors: M1, M2, M3, M4 Event: Administrator requests to modify the user information. Actors: Administrator (initiator) Overview: This use case captures the process of modifying information for a user.

Use Case Number: UC14 Name: CreateAccount Authors: M1, M2, M3, M4 Event: Administrator requests to create an account. Actors: Administrator (initiator) Overview: This use case captures the process of creating an account.

Use Case Number: UC15 Name: ModifyAccount Authors: M1, M2, M3, M4 Event: Administrator requests to modify the account information. Actors: Administrator (initiator) Overview: This use case captures the process of modifying the information for an account.

Use Case Number: UC16 Name: ModifyBillingPlan Authors: M1, M2, M3, M4 Event: Administrator requests to modify a billing plan. Actors: Administrator (initiator) Overview: This use case captures the process of modifying a billing plan.

Use Case Number: UC17 Name: ReactivateAccount Authors: M1, M2, M3, M4 Event: Administrator selects option to reactivate an account. The phone number is passed as input. Actors: Administrator (initiator) Overview: This use case captures the process of reactivating a suspended account in the system.

Use Case Number: UC18 Name: GetUnusedPhoneNumber Authors: M1, M2, M3, M4 Event: Administrator selects option to find the next unused phone number. Actors: Administrator (initiator) Overview: This use case captures the process of obtaining the next unused number in the system.

Use Case Number: UC19 Name: ViewLog Authors: M1, M2, M3, M4 Event: Administrator requests to view the test and call log files. Actors: Administrator (initiator) Overview: This use case captures the process of viewing the test and call log files.

Use Case Number: UC20 Name: ResetPhone Authors: M1, M2, M3, M4 Event: Administrator requests a phone to be reset. The phone number is passed in as input. Actors: Administrator (initiator) Overview: This use case captures the process of resetting a phone.

Use Case Number: UC21 Name: SetMaxConnections Authors: M1, M2, M3, M4 Event: Administrator requests to set the maximum number of simultaneous connections. Actors: Administrator (initiator) Overview: This use case captures the process of setting the maximum simultaneous connections.

Use Case Number: UC22 Name: SetTestInterval Authors: M1, M2, M3, M4 Event: Administrator requests to set the automatic test interval. Actors: Administrator (initiator) Overview: This use case captures the process of setting the automatic test interval.

Use Case Number: UC23 Name: RunAutomaticTest Authors: M1, M2, M3, M4 Event: Timer requests automatic tests to be performed on the system phones. Actors: Timer (initiator) Overview: This use case captures the process of automatic testing on the system phones.
